translation.en: [Santa] "…and laying a finger aside of my nose,
translation.zh: “…并把一根手指放在我鼻子旁边

translation.en: I gave him a nod and up the chimney I rose!
translation.zh: 我对他点了一下头 然后上了烟囱！

translation.en: I sprang to my sleigh, gave my flight team a whistle,
translation.zh: 我跳上雪橇给我的飞行团队吹了一声口哨

translation.en: and away we all flew like the down of a thistle.
translation.zh: 然后我们就一起乘风而去

translation.en: But I gave him a shout, ere we drove out of sight,
translation.zh: 但在我们远离视线之前我对他们大喊一声

translation.en: Merry Christmas to all…"
translation.zh: 祝大家圣诞快乐…”

translation.en: [kids] And to all a good night.
translation.zh: 也祝大家晚安！

translation.en: -Yay! [laughing] -Yes! Ho ho ho ho!
translation.zh: -好哎！-对！

translation.en: -[clock chimes] -Oh, would you look at that.
translation.zh: 噢 看看啊

translation.en: -Time for bed, little ones. -[kids] Aww…
translation.zh: 该睡觉了 小朋友

translation.en: Come on, Santa, one more story.
translation.zh: 拜托 圣诞老人 再讲一个故事嘛

translation.en: I don't think so. What would your parents say?
translation.zh: 还是不要了 你们父母会怎么说呢？

translation.en: They won't care.
translation.zh: 他们无所谓

translation.en: -We won't tell. -Please?
translation.zh: -我们不说出去-求你了？

translation.en: Ho ho ho ho! You must have heard every Christmas story there is by now.
translation.zh: 所有的圣诞故事你们一定都已经听过了

translation.en: Although, there is one tale you may not have heard.
translation.zh: 不过还有一个故事 你们可能没听过

translation.en: Honestly, it's kind of… crazy.
translation.zh: 说实话 这个故事点疯狂

translation.en: You kids wouldn't want to hear a crazy Christmas story, would you?
translation.zh: 你们这些孩子不会想要听疯狂的圣诞故事 对吧？

translation.en: [kids] Yeah!
translation.zh: 要听！

translation.en: [Santa] Once upon a time, there was a race of aliens known as Klepts.
translation.zh: 从前 有一个外星种族叫作克雷普兹族人

translation.en: [Santa] Long ago, they were colorful creatures from a beautiful planet,
translation.zh: 很久以前 他们是彩色的生物来自一个美丽的星球

translation.en: -but they grew greedy. -Ah!
translation.zh: 但是他们变得贪婪

translation.en: They plundered all their home planet -had to offer… -Hmm. Hmm. Hmm?
translation.zh: 他们掠夺了自己星球上的一切

translation.en: -…and their color faded away. -Aw…
translation.zh: 他们的颜色渐渐褪去

translation.en: So, they took to the stars…
translation.zh: 于是 他们走向了太空

translation.en: moving from galaxy to galaxy,
translation.zh: 从一个星系又到另一个星系

translation.en: swindling, stealing and snatching whatever they could.
translation.zh: 肆无忌惮地欺骗、盗窃并掠夺

translation.en: The poor Klepts had no concept of kindness or joy.
translation.zh: 可怜的克雷普兹族人没有友善或喜悦的概念

translation.en: All they ever felt was greed.
translation.zh: 他们只能感觉到贪婪

translation.en: But the more the Klepts had,
translation.zh: 但是克雷普兹族人拥有越多

translation.en: the more they wanted.
translation.zh: 就越想要更多

translation.en: [chuckles] They even stole from one another!
translation.zh: 他们甚至互相偷窃！

translation.en: -Ah! -X was the smallest of the Klepts,
translation.zh: X是克雷普兹族人中最小的一个

translation.en: -but he was also the sneakiest. -Ah.
translation.zh: 但他也是最狡诈的一个

translation.en: -[Santa] But no matter how clever X was… -Huh?
translation.zh: 但是不论X多么聪明

translation.en: -…he was still the smallest. -[laughing]
translation.zh: 他始终是最小的一个

translation.en: [Santa] X was an excellent thief…
translation.zh: X是一个出色的盗贼

translation.en: -but because of his size… -Ah!
translation.zh: 但是因为他的体型

translation.en: …the other Klepts -never took him seriously. -[laughing]
translation.zh: 其他克雷普兹族人从来不把他当回事

translation.en: [Santa] The Klepts' supreme leader was a nasty piece of work,
translation.zh: 克雷普兹族人的最高领导人是一个糟糕的家伙

translation.en: -mean, greedy, and dangerous. -[throne whirring]
translation.zh: 刻薄、贪婪且危险

translation.en: Her name was Z.
translation.zh: 她的名字叫Z

translation.en: And Z was about to reveal -her most diabolical plan yet. -[staff clangs]
translation.zh: Z即将揭晓她至今最为恶毒的计划

translation.en: Klepts, a fabulous treasure is within our grasp.
translation.zh: 克雷普兹族人 有一块珍宝触手可及

translation.en: This is Earth,
translation.zh: 这是地球

translation.en: the most stuff-filled planet we've ever seen.
translation.zh: 我们见到过的最丰饶的星球

translation.en: -Alone and unguarded… -Ooh! …in the vastness of space.
translation.zh: 独自存在于广袤的太空中 毫无防备

translation.en: You almost feel sorry for it.
translation.zh: 几乎令人感到怜惜

translation.en: [chuckles] Almost.
translation.zh: 几乎

translation.en: We will build the ultimate weapon: the Gyrotron!
translation.zh: 我们将建造终极武器：回旋仪！

translation.en: [Z] At the magnetic North Pole of the planet,
translation.zh: 在星球的磁北极

translation.en: -it will obliterate the planet's gravity. -[beeping]
translation.zh: 它将消除这个星球的重力

translation.en: All the stuff on the surface will float out into space,
translation.zh: 星球表面所有的东西都将飘入太空

translation.en: where we will be waiting to snatch it up.
translation.zh: 我们会在太空中等待着以便将一切收入囊中

translation.en: We will stuff their stuff into our stuff chambers,
translation.zh: 我们会把他们的东西放入我们的仓库

translation.en: and then their stuff will be our stuff!
translation.zh: 这样他们的东西就会成为我们的东西！

translation.en: One of you will go to Earth and assemble the Gyrotron.
translation.zh: 你们中的一个将前往地球组装回旋仪

translation.en: And let me remind you that failure will be… frowned upon.
translation.zh: 我提醒一下你们 失败会引起不满哦

translation.en: Any volunteers?
translation.zh: 有谁自告奋勇吗？

translation.en: [Santa] X knew that if he could steal more stuff -than any Klept in Klept history… -Hmm!
translation.zh: X知道 如果能够成为克雷普兹族史上偷东西最多的人

translation.en: …they would finally be forced to take him seriously.
translation.zh: 他们最终会被迫重视自己

translation.en: You're volunteering?
translation.zh: 你自告奋勇？

translation.en: I was hoping for someone a bit taller.
translation.zh: 我倒是希望来一个更高一点的

translation.en: Okay, the job is yours, little Klept.
translation.zh: 好的 任务归你了 小克雷普兹族人

translation.en: Impress me.
translation.zh: 让我看看你的本事吧

translation.en: [Santa] X had been assigned a Semi-Automatic-Multi-Tasking-Unit,
translation.zh: 上级给X分配了一个半自动多任务装置

translation.en: -or SAMTU. -[X grunting]
translation.zh: 简称“参图”

translation.en: [Santa] And little did X realize just how helpful SAMTU would turn out to be.
translation.zh: 当时X并不知道参图会是多么有用

translation.en: -[squeaking] -[barks]
translation.zh: （北极）

translation.en: [Santa] Of all the places to build their weapon of doom,
translation.zh: 有很多地方可以建造这末日武器

translation.en: the Klepts chose the North Pole…
translation.zh: 克雷普兹族人选择了北极

translation.en: right in the heart of Christmas Town…
translation.zh: 就在圣诞镇的中心

translation.en: just two days before Christmas Eve!
translation.zh: 就在圣诞夜之前两天！

translation.en: And who would be the first line of defense
translation.zh: 谁会成为第一道防线

translation.en: against this alien invasion?
translation.zh: 来抵御这外星入侵呢？

translation.en: A handful of elves.
translation.zh: 几个精灵

translation.en: [girl giggles] Hold still, let me put your ribbon on.
translation.zh: 别动 我给你把带子戴上

translation.en: [woman] Now, say "ah."
translation.zh: 张大嘴巴

translation.en: [girl] Mom, help!
translation.zh: 妈妈 帮帮我！

translation.en: Try your father's auto-bow.
translation.zh: 试试你父亲的自动打结器

translation.en: Point it at the puppy and push the button.
translation.zh: 对着小狗按下按钮

translation.en: His gadgets are great… mostly. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 他的小设备都很好 多数情况是这样

translation.en: [gasps] Yay! You look perfect!
translation.zh: 好哎！你看起来太棒了！

translation.en: -Mom, we can't give this one away. -[panting] Look at those eyes.
translation.zh: 妈妈 我们不能把它送走 看它的眼睛

translation.en: -Giving is what Christmas is all about. -I know.
translation.zh: 但是圣诞的真谛就在于付出 我知道

translation.en: But she's such a good girl!
translation.zh: 可是它真的好乖啊！

translation.en: [Santa] When X laid eyes on Christmas Town,
translation.zh: 当X看到圣诞镇的时候

translation.en: he didn't see magic and wonder.
translation.zh: 他没有看到魔法和神奇

translation.en: He only saw all the stuff he could steal.
translation.zh: 在他眼里都是可以偷的东西

translation.en: [Santa] It's in a Klept's nature to steal,
translation.zh: 克雷普兹族人天性爱偷东西

translation.en: -so, Christmas Town was a paradise for X. -Wow!
translation.zh: 所以圣诞镇对X来说就是天堂

translation.en: As SAMTU led him to the precise spot where they would build the Gyrotron,
translation.zh: 参图把他带到建造回旋仪的准确位置

translation.en: X couldn't help but pilfer.
translation.zh: X情不自禁地偷东西

translation.en: [Santa] X didn't know it, but he had arrived on a particularly special night.
translation.zh: X并不知道 自己到来的时候是一个特别的夜晚

translation.en: On the other side of town, I was presenting our newest invention.
translation.zh: 在镇子的另一边我正在展示我们最新的发明

translation.en: You're on, big guy. Three, two…
translation.zh: 看你的了 大个子 三、二…

translation.en: Hello-ho-ho, everyone!
translation.zh: 大家好！

translation.en: And thank you for coming.
translation.zh: 感谢你们前来！

translation.en: I know how busy you all are, but you're my family,
translation.zh: 我知道你们都很忙不过你们是我的家人

translation.en: and I have something incredible to show you.
translation.zh: 我有很棒的东西给你们看

translation.en: Everybody loves a baby! They're soft and cute.
translation.zh: 大家都喜欢宝宝！ 他们又柔软 又可爱

translation.en: So, it's no wonder the planet is bursting with more kids than ever before.
translation.zh: 所以也难怪地球上的孩子越来越多

translation.en: Friends, we need a faster method
translation.zh: 朋友们 我们需要一个更快的方法送礼物

translation.en: for delivering gifts.
translation.zh: 我们需要一个更快的方法送礼物

translation.en: I had a vision, a dream!
translation.zh: 我有一个愿景 有一个梦！

translation.en: I saw us bringing gifts to every girl and boy on the face of the Earth
translation.zh: 我看到我们把礼物带给地球上每一个男孩和女孩

translation.en: at the speed of light!
translation.zh: 以光的速度！

translation.en: And with the help of our lead mechanic, Obie,
translation.zh: 在我们首席机械师欧比的帮助下

translation.en: -we have made my dream a reality! -[applause, cheering]
translation.zh: 我们把我的梦变成了现实！

translation.en: Elves, snowmen, citizens of the North Pole,
translation.zh: 精灵、雪人、北极的公民

translation.en: may I present to you,
translation.zh: 请允许我给大家展示

translation.en: the deluxe, fully loaded, gravity-defying Santa Super Sleigh!
translation.zh: 豪华、满载无视重力的超级圣诞雪橇！

translation.en: I named it myself.
translation.zh: 我亲自取的名字

translation.en: -My dad made that! -Yes, he did.
translation.zh: -是我爸爸造的！-没错

translation.en: -Boo! -Boo!
Okay, here we go.
translation.zh: 好的 启动

translation.en: -Hi! Oh! Oh, that's not good. -[alarm beeping]
translation.zh: 你好 噢 这可不妙

translation.en: -Whoa! -I have a feeling that this year will be the most crackerjack Christm-- Ahh!
translation.zh: 我有预感今年会是最火爆的圣诞…

translation.en: -Whoa! Santa! Watch out! -[screams]
translation.zh: 圣诞老人！小心！

translation.en: Not good.
translation.zh: 不妙

translation.en: Let me turn the… No! Ah! Whoa!
translation.zh: 让我把…

translation.en: Okay, okay, no, it's okay. No, no, no, no.
translation.zh: 没事 没事 不不不

translation.en: Santa?
translation.zh: 圣诞老人？

translation.en: Santa, are you okay?
translation.zh: 圣诞老人 你没事吧？

translation.en: [chuckles] Well, that wasn't part of the plan, but it was fun!
translation.zh: 这不在计划之内 不过很好玩！

translation.en: Everyone okay?
translation.zh: 大家都没事吧？

translation.en: Sorry, the light-speed booster still isn't quite up to--
translation.zh: 对不起 光速助推器还是没有太…

translation.en: Christmas Eve is tomorrow!
translation.zh: 但明天就是圣诞前夜

translation.en: How will we deliver gifts without the Super Sleigh?
translation.zh: 没有超级雪橇 我们怎么送礼物呢？

translation.en: [chuckles] There's plenty of time!
translation.zh: 时间充足！

translation.en: By midnight tomorrow, the sleigh will be in perfect working order.
translation.zh: 在明天午夜之前雪橇就可以完全正常地工作

translation.en: I have full faith in Obie.
translation.zh: 我对欧比充满信心

translation.en: Okay. Yeah.
translation.zh: 好吧 嗯

translation.en: -Are you okay? -I'm fine. I just--
translation.zh: 你还好吧？ 我没事 只是…我真的得回去工作了

translation.en: I really gotta get back to work.
translation.zh: 我没事 只是…我真的得回去工作了

translation.en: Wait, you're not coming home?
translation.zh: 等等 你不回家？

translation.en: I can't, I… I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我不能回家 对不起

translation.en: The sleigh is my responsibility, and I can't let Santa down.
translation.zh: 雪橇是我的责任我不能让圣诞老人失望

translation.en: But I'll be home later to tuck you in. I promise.
translation.zh: 不过我会晚一点回家哄你睡觉 我保证

translation.en: Okay, I understand.
translation.zh: 好的 我明白

translation.en: Noelle, I'm… I'm trying my best.
translation.zh: 诺儿 我在尽全力

translation.en: We know you are.
translation.zh: 我们知道的

translation.en: I'll make it up to her. I'll find her the best Christmas gift ever this year.
translation.zh: 我会补偿她 今年我会给她找到史上最好的圣诞礼物

translation.en: The only gift she wants is you.
translation.zh: 她唯一想要的礼物就是你

translation.en: You get that sleigh fixed and come home to us.
translation.zh: 你把雪橇修好 然后回家陪我们

translation.en: -[doll 1] Mama. -[doll 2] Papa.
translation.zh: -妈妈-爸爸

translation.en: [doll] Mama.
translation.zh: 妈妈

translation.en: Mama.
translation.zh: 妈妈

translation.en: [Santa] It was just one more day until Christmas.
translation.zh: 离圣诞节只剩一天了

translation.en: My flight crew and I made the final plans for our first light-speed delivery.
translation.zh: 我和我的飞行团队 已为我们第一次光速送礼物安排妥当

translation.en: But not everyone was feeling the Christmas spirit.
translation.zh: 但并不是每个人都感受到了圣诞氛围

translation.en: And back home, Obie's family was missing him.
translation.zh: 在家里 欧比的家人在想他

translation.en: [Santa] One downside of the gravity-destroying Gyrotron
translation.zh: 回旋仪能摧毁重力 但它有一项缺点

translation.en: is that some assembly is required.
translation.zh: 那就是需要进行一些组装

translation.en: [Santa] Whenever a Klept is completely out of options,
translation.zh: 每当克雷普兹族人完全没办法的时候

translation.en: their final resort is to play dead.
translation.zh: 他们最终的解决方法就是装死

translation.en: It was X's job to assemble the Gyrotron,
translation.zh: 组装回旋仪是X的工作

translation.en: -but he had better things to do. -Hmm.
translation.zh: 但是他还有别的事要做

translation.en: So, he reprogrammed SAMTU to do the job for him.
translation.zh: 于是 他给参图重新设定程序为自己完成工作

translation.en: [Santa] X knew his mission was top priority,
translation.zh: X知道自己的任务最为重要

translation.en: but he couldn't stop thinking -about Christmas Town. -Ooh.
translation.zh: 但是他忍不住去想圣诞镇

translation.en: [Santa] Up above him, there was so much stuff just waiting, begging, to be taken.
translation.zh: 在他上方 有好多东西在等着求着被拿走

translation.en: I don't know what's wrong, but the light-speed booster won't work.
translation.zh: 圣诞老人 我不知道是什么问题但光速推进器还是不起作用

translation.en: I know my calculations are right, but…
translation.zh: 我知道我计算没错 但是…

translation.en: -Maybe they're not. -[X groans]
translation.zh: 好吧 也许是错了

translation.en: [Santa] I'm sure they're perfect.
translation.zh: 一定完全没问题 欧比

translation.en: -If anyone can do this, it's you. -[X gasps]
translation.zh: 如果有谁能做到 那一定是你

translation.en: -[Santa] I'll let you get back to work. -[Obie] Okay.
translation.zh: 你继续工作吧 好的

translation.en: Thanks, Santa.
translation.zh: 谢谢 圣诞老人

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 有人吗？

translation.en: Somebody there?
translation.zh: 有谁在吗？

translation.en: [Obie] Hello?
translation.zh: 有人吗？

translation.en: Oh, just a toy. What are you, a doll?
translation.zh: 噢 一个玩具 是娃娃吗？

translation.en: Mama.
translation.zh: 妈妈

translation.en: -Nice. -Papa.
translation.zh: -不错-爸爸

translation.en: Hey, hey! I know someone who's gonna just love you.
translation.zh: 哎 我知道有人会非常喜欢你

translation.en: Holly? You up?
translation.zh: 荷莉？你还醒着吗？

translation.en: Good night, Sugarplum.
translation.zh: 晚安 小糖果

translation.en: Sorry I haven't been, uh…
translation.zh: 对不起 我没有…

translation.en: I'm just sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: [whispers] Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐

translation.en: -[Santa] In that moment… -Huh?
translation.zh: 在这一刻

translation.en: …X felt something he'd never felt before.
translation.zh: X感受到了自己以前从未感受到的东西

translation.en: -Something he didn't even have a word for. -Ah…
translation.zh: 他自己甚至都没有词语来描述

translation.en: But we do.
translation.zh: 但我们有

translation.en: -It was love, pure and sweet. -Ah.
translation.zh: 那就是爱 纯粹而甜美

translation.en: X wanted to forget about this strange feeling.
translation.zh: X想要忘记这奇怪的感觉

translation.en: But like it or not, he was trapped.
translation.zh: 但无论是否喜欢 他已经深陷其中

translation.en: Who are you?
translation.zh: 你是谁？

translation.en: Dad, Dad, it's perfect!
translation.zh: 爸爸 太棒了！

translation.en: How did you find it?
translation.zh: 你是怎么找到的？

translation.en: Where's Dad?
translation.zh: 爸爸在哪里？

translation.en: Work? That's okay.
translation.zh: 在上班？好吧

translation.en: He needs to fix the sleigh, I know.
translation.zh: 他得修好雪橇 我知道

translation.en: Oh, did you see what Dad got me?
translation.zh: 噢 看到爸爸送了什么给我吗？

translation.en: I did not.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: It's a doll!
translation.zh: 是一个娃娃！

translation.en: And I don't quite know what kind of doll,
translation.zh: 我不太清楚是什么娃娃

translation.en: but I think there's something special about it.
translation.zh: 不过我觉得它挺特别

translation.en: [Santa] There's nothing quite like Christmas Eve in Christmas Town.
translation.zh: 在圣诞镇没什么可以和圣诞前夜相比

translation.en: There's a spirit of joy that spreads through every household.
translation.zh: 每家每户都洋溢着欢乐的气氛

translation.en: A deep appreciation for those we love
translation.zh: 深深地感谢我们爱的人

translation.en: and the precious time we get to spend together.
translation.zh: 以及我们有机会共度的宝贵时光

translation.en: These feelings were brand new to X
translation.zh: 这些感觉对X来说是全新的

translation.en: -and made him feel awfully strange. -[tinkling]
translation.zh: 使他感到非常奇怪

translation.en: -And as the day went on… -[elves caroling]
translation.zh: 随着这一天慢慢过去

translation.en: …X witnessed everyday acts of kindness and generosity.
translation.zh: X看到了日常的友善和慷慨行为

translation.en: He saw how the elves loved to sing songs,
translation.zh: 他看到精灵们是多么热爱唱歌

translation.en: give gifts, to smile and laugh.
translation.zh: 赠送礼物、欢声笑语

translation.en: What utterly strange creatures these elves were.
translation.zh: 这些精灵太奇怪了！

translation.en: There was so much wonderful stuff to steal!
translation.zh: 有好多好东西可以偷啊！

translation.en: They should be taking, he thought.
translation.zh: 他们应该拿走 他心想

translation.en: Yet they were not stealing a thing!
translation.zh: 可他们什么都没偷！

translation.en: It all made no sense to X.
translation.zh: X完全无法理解

translation.en: -[Holly] Are you leaving, too? -Huh?
translation.zh: 你也要走吗？

translation.en: You don't have to pretend.
translation.zh: 你不用假装 我早就知道你会走路

translation.en: I knew you could walk. You're not very good at hiding it.
translation.zh: 你不用假装 我早就知道你会走路 你不太擅长隐藏这一点

translation.en: It's okay. You can have whatever you want. It's just stuff.
translation.zh: 没事 你想要什么都行只不过是东西罢了

translation.en: -Why are you leaving? -Um…
translation.zh: 你为什么要走？

translation.en: Do you have to go to work, too?
translation.zh: 你也得去上班吗？

translation.en: That's okay. I understand.
translation.zh: 没事 我明白

translation.en: Wait here.
translation.zh: 在这里等一下

translation.en: -[panting] -Here you go.
translation.zh: 给你

translation.en: Nobody likes being alone, especially on Christmas.
translation.zh: 没人喜欢孤零零一个人尤其是在圣诞节

translation.en: [Santa] X finally understood how wonderful it was to receive a gift.
translation.zh: X终于明白 收到礼物是多么美好

translation.en: -It was so much better than stealing! -[gasps]
translation.zh: 比偷好多了！

translation.en: Because a present wasn't just meaningless stuff.
translation.zh: 因为礼物不仅是无意义的东西

translation.en: It meant someone cared about him.
translation.zh: 它意味着有人关心他

translation.en: An act of love like that?
translation.zh: 像这样的爱的行动？

translation.en: Well, it didn't just change X on the inside.
translation.zh: 这不光改变了X的内心

translation.en: [Santa] X felt amazing!
translation.zh: X感到棒极了！

translation.en: And he wanted, more than anything, to share this feeling,
translation.zh: 他非常想要分享这种感觉

translation.en: to show Holly that he cared about her just as much.
translation.zh: 让荷莉看到 自己也同样关心她

translation.en: But what could X give her that she didn't already have?
translation.zh: 但X能给她什么她没有的东西呢？

translation.en: As they raced through Christmas Town,
translation.zh: 他们在圣诞镇的街道上飞奔的时候

translation.en: -X told Holly everything. -Whoa!
translation.zh: X把一切都告诉了荷莉

translation.en: He told her about the Klepts and Supreme Leader Z
translation.zh: 告诉她克雷普兹族人以及最高领导人Z的事

translation.en: -and what he was sent here to do. -What?
translation.zh: 还有派他来这里要做的事 什么？

translation.en: He told her he wasn't going to do that anymore.
translation.zh: 但是他说自己打算不做了

translation.en: Instead, he'd come up with a wonderful new plan, just for Holly.
translation.zh: 相反 他想出了一个美妙的新计划就为了荷莉

translation.en: X, look out!
translation.zh: X 当心！

translation.en: Be careful.
translation.zh: 小心一点

translation.en: [Santa] With SAMTU successfully reprogrammed, X was ready to begin his plan.
translation.zh: 在成功地给参图重新设定程序之后X做好了启动计划的准备

translation.en: Dad? Dad?
translation.zh: 爸爸？

translation.en: I don't know where my dad is.
translation.zh: 我不知道我爸爸在哪里

translation.en: With a new sleigh, our delivery time will be cut by 90%!
translation.zh: 有了新的雪橇我们的送礼物时间可以削减九成！

translation.en: Uh… Santa? Obie? Is everything okay?
translation.zh: -圣诞老人？-欧比 都还好吧？

translation.en: Well, not exactly.
translation.zh: 呃 不太好

translation.en: I… I couldn't fix it.
translation.zh: 我修不好

translation.en: I tried everything. It just won't work. My math must have been wrong, and I…
translation.zh: 我什么都试过了 就是不行我一定是算错了 我…

translation.en: I'm sorry. I… I failed you, and I ruined Christmas.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉 我让你失望了圣诞节被我毁了

translation.en: I've put a lot of pressure on you this year, haven't I, old friend?
translation.zh: 我今年给了你很大压力是吧 老朋友？

translation.en: I have, and I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 确实是这样 对不起

translation.en: How about we look at this sleigh together and see what we can do.
translation.zh: 不如一起看一下雪橇看看咱们有没有什么办法

translation.en: What do you say?
translation.zh: 你说怎么样？

translation.en: Hey, Santa?
translation.zh: 圣诞老人

translation.en: Uh, just in case we can't get the sleigh to work, do you have a plan B?
translation.zh: 万一咱们没办法修好雪橇你有没有后备方案？

translation.en: Ho-ho-ho! Nope.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Fixing the Super Sleigh might have been difficult for Obie,
translation.zh: 修超级雪橇 对欧比来说或许很难

translation.en: but for SAMTU, light-speed engine repair -was well within his programming. -Ah.
translation.zh: 但对于参图来说光速发动机修理在他的程序范围之内

translation.en: You did it! You did it!
translation.zh: 你成功了！

translation.en: Obie, you were pranking me! [laughs]
translation.zh: 欧比 你给我搞恶作剧啊！

translation.en: How wonderful!
translation.zh: 太棒了！

translation.en: Uh… I, uh… Just a second, Santa.
translation.zh: 我… 稍等 圣诞老人

translation.en: Dad!
translation.zh: 爸爸！

translation.en: -What's going on? How-- -It was X! The doll you gave me.
translation.zh: 怎么回事？你怎么… 是X！你给我的那个娃娃

translation.en: He's not a doll, he's an alien! He came to steal.
translation.zh: -嗯-他不是娃娃 是外星人！ -好的-他来这里偷东西

translation.en: But I gave him a puppy, and he changed colors!
translation.zh: 我给他小狗 他就变了颜色

translation.en: And he has a robot.
translation.zh: -嗯-他有个机器人

translation.en: The robot was doing bad things.
translation.zh: -机器人之前也在做坏事-嗯

translation.en: X reprogrammed him, then we came here, and his robot fixed the sleigh!
translation.zh: 但X给他重新设定程序 然后我们来这里机器人就把雪橇修好了

translation.en: I… But why?
translation.zh: 我…可是为什么呢？

translation.en: So we can all be together on Christmas.
translation.zh: 这样咱们就能在圣诞节团圆了

translation.en: That was X's present to me.
translation.zh: 这是X送我的礼物

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: [Santa] X was the first Klept in history -to give a gift… -Hmm.
translation.zh: X是史上第一个送出礼物的克雷普兹族人

translation.en: …and it felt even better than he had hoped.
translation.zh: 这种感觉比他希望的更好

translation.en: The little alien was imbued with the spirit of Christmas.
translation.zh: 小外星人沉浸在圣诞氛围之中

translation.en: The fully-loaded Super Santa Sleigh was ready to rip!
translation.zh: 超级圣诞雪橇整装待发！

translation.en: And Obie and Holly were together.
translation.zh: 欧比和荷莉团圆了

translation.en: [Santa] A perfect, happy ending for our Christmas tale.
translation.zh: 一个圣诞故事完美大团圆结局

translation.en: I never said this Christmas story had a happy ending.
translation.zh: 但我可没说这个圣诞是大团圆结局

translation.en: -I said this story was crazy! -[elves screaming]
translation.zh: 我说了这个故事很疯狂！

translation.en: Bet you forgot about old Z, didn't you?
translation.zh: 你们一定忘记了老Z 是吧？

translation.en: [chuckles] Well, she didn't forget,
translation.zh: 她没忘记

translation.en: and was here to finish the job.
translation.zh: 她来到这里完成任务

translation.en: Activate the Gyrotron!
translation.zh: 激活回旋仪！

translation.en: Destroy Earth's gravity and take everything!
translation.zh: 摧毁地球重力 拿走一切！

translation.en: Alien attack! Retreat!
translation.zh: 外星人袭击啦！撤退！

translation.en: There's too many of--
translation.zh: 太多…

translation.en: Secure the north wall with the Ice Brigade!
translation.zh: 派冰雪旅守住北墙！

translation.en: Aerial reindeer support to the west!
translation.zh: 空中驯鹿到西边支援！

translation.en: The battle for Christmas Town had begun.
translation.zh: 圣诞镇战斗开始了

translation.en: -Mom's at the kennel! We have to go! -You're right. Stay close!
translation.zh: -爸 妈妈在狗狗屋 咱们得赶快去！-对 跟紧我！

translation.en: [Santa] X knew that the Gyrotron -could still be activated… -Ah!
translation.zh: X知道 回旋仪仍然可以激活

translation.en: -…so he sent SAMTU to check on it. -[beeping]
translation.zh: 于是 他派参图去看一下

translation.en: Get the sleigh to safety!
translation.zh: 把雪橇开去安全的地方！

translation.en: Nobody messes with my holiday!
translation.zh: 谁都不能来给我的节日捣乱！

translation.en: Oh! Oh, boy! This complicates things.
translation.zh: 天哪！这可麻烦了

translation.en: -Let's round them all up. -[barking]
translation.zh: 把他们都拉到一起

translation.en: Come here, little guy.
translation.zh: 过来 小家伙

translation.en: Heads up. Puppy coming your way.
translation.zh: 小心 小狗来了

translation.en: This is kind of fun, once you get used to it.
translation.zh: 这还挺好玩的 习惯了就好

translation.en: -[Holly gasps] -[Noelle] What's wrong? We got this, Mom.
translation.zh: -怎么了？-我们能对付 妈妈

translation.en: [Holly] Yes!
translation.zh: 好！

translation.en: Will someone please blast that miserable thing out of the sky?
translation.zh: 谁来把那可怜玩意儿从天上轰下来？

translation.en: -Oh, no! -[X screaming]
translation.zh: 不是吧！

translation.en: -[gibbering gratefully] -Forget about it.
translation.zh: 算了

translation.en: It's what we do.
translation.zh: 我们就是干这个的

translation.en: [Santa] It was a devastating loss.
translation.zh: 结果一败涂地

translation.en: Christmas Town had fallen,
translation.zh: 圣诞镇陷落

translation.en: and the Klepts were triumphant.
translation.zh: 克雷普兹族人胜利了

translation.en: [doll squeaks] Mama.
translation.zh: 妈妈

translation.en: [echoing] X!
translation.zh: X！

translation.en: Come closer so I can see you.
translation.zh: 走近一点 好让我看得见你

translation.en: You deviated from my plan.
translation.zh: 你没有按我的计划行动

translation.en: Klepts!
translation.zh: 克雷普兹族人！

translation.en: I would like you to meet your new -Vice Supreme Leader! -Huh?
translation.zh: 见一下你们的新任副最高领导人！

translation.en: X has shown more unscrupulous treachery -than all of you combined. -Huh.
translation.zh: X所显示出的肆无忌惮的狡诈超过了你们的总和

translation.en: He assembled the Gyrotron,
translation.zh: 他组装好回旋仪

translation.en: gained the trust of these moronic creatures
translation.zh: 取得了这些低能生物的信任

translation.en: and led us right to the best stuff we have ever seen!
translation.zh: 给我们带来了前所未见的最好的东西！

translation.en: -[Z cackles] -[Santa] Once upon a time, this would have been everything X could have ever wanted.
translation.zh: 这曾经是X想要拥有的一切

translation.en: But when he saw Holly,
translation.zh: 但是当他看见荷莉的时候

translation.en: X knew what he had to do.
translation.zh: 他就知道自己必须怎么做

translation.en: -[panting] -What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你干嘛？

translation.en: What in the-- Ah!
translation.zh: 你到底…

translation.en: What's happening to me?
translation.zh: 我怎么了？

translation.en: I feel so… warm.
translation.zh: 我感到好温暖

translation.en: -[tinkling] -It's… It's… it's wonderful!
translation.zh: 太奇妙了！

translation.en: [Santa] For so long there had been an emptiness -inside the Klepts… -[growls]
translation.zh: 长久以来 克雷普兹族人心中的空虚

translation.en: …that no amount of taking could ever fill.
translation.zh: 夺来多少东西都无法填满

translation.en: -[squeaks] -Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐

translation.en: -[Klept] Hmm… Hmm! Aw… -[Santa] But now, thanks to X,
translation.zh: 但是现在 多亏了X

translation.en: that hollow space was filled with love…
translation.zh: 这空虚被爱填满

translation.en: and transformed by the spirit of Christmas.
translation.zh: 被圣诞的精神转化

translation.en: Yes, it was this new concept of giving
translation.zh: 是的 是给予这个新的概念

translation.en: that changed the Klepts.
translation.zh: 改变了克雷普兹族人

translation.en: Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐

translation.en: [Santa] They were restored to the colorful creatures they once were.
translation.zh: 他们变回了曾经的彩色生物

translation.en: [Santa] It's Christmas.
translation.zh: 圣诞节到了

translation.en: The sun's coming up.
translation.zh: 太阳正在升起

translation.en: Children will wake up, and there'll be nothing under their trees!
translation.zh: 孩子们会醒来但他们的圣诞树下什么都没有！

translation.en: And there's not enough time to deliver the gifts.
translation.zh: 而且没时间送礼物了

translation.en: [Santa] Yes, that little X surprised them all that day.
translation.zh: 是的 小X这一整天都在给他们惊喜

translation.en: [Santa] He may have been the smallest of Klepts, but it turns out
translation.zh: 他也许是最小的克雷普兹族人 但是 原来他有最宽广的心胸

translation.en: -he had the biggest heart. -Ah!
translation.zh: 但是 原来他有最宽广的心胸

translation.en: [Santa] And as dawn broke on Christmas morning,
translation.zh: 圣诞节的早晨 黎明破晓

translation.en: the world could never have predicted just how special,
translation.zh: 全世界永远无法预测 这一天会多么特殊、多么独一无二

translation.en: how unique, how…
translation.zh: 这一天会多么特殊、多么独一无二

translation.en: …alien it would be.
translation.zh: 多么充满外星风情

translation.en: The Klepts helped deliver toys in an armada of spaceships.
translation.zh: 克雷普兹族人用宇宙飞船舰队帮助运送玩具

translation.en: Faster than the speed of light!
translation.zh: 比光速更快！

translation.en: Just like my vision!
translation.zh: 就像我的愿景一样！

translation.en: Sort of.
translation.zh: 差不多吧

translation.en: It was all thanks to a little girl
translation.zh: 这一切都要感谢一个小姑娘

translation.en: and an even littler alien,
translation.zh: 还有一个更小的外星人

translation.en: and a whole lot of love.
translation.zh: 还有许多的爱

translation.en: And that is the story of the very first Alien Christmas.
translation.zh: 这就是第一个外星圣诞节的故事

translation.en: The end.
translation.zh: 剧终
